title: System of a Down.
content:
OMG! Gal made a topic! OH NOSE!

I know there are a few music buffs on the PCKF. While I don't consider myself a music guru by ANY means I still like to listen to it every once in a while. (No really Gal? Are you SERIOUS?![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] )

Now there is this one band in particular that has me perplexed. As from the title, you probably guessed that I am talking about System of a Down.

... Uh... which I am... by the way.

*Ahem*

ANYWAY, I was wondering what your opinion of this band is, if any. I heard all kinds of things about them. From "OMG AWESOMESAUCE1" to "EMO!" to "LOL Faggot baNd. #1Nerd."

I have heard quite a few of their CDs... and quite frankly... I don't know WHAT to make of this band. The singer is...
Um, he has a "distinctive" voice and can be rather annoying. (Anyone who heard one of their songs is like "UH HUH!")
Now the music its self is rather catchy, but that does not mean it is good. I like the band but at the same time I can't stand it sometimes. It's weird.

Well enough of my wishie-washieness. Waffling-waffleironing. Tell me what YOU think of System of a Down. And don't just be like "ROXORS ONE", or "Suzors1." (I'm looking at YOU Metallica thread.) Tell my WHY you think they are good or WHY you think they are bad.
I like intelligent threads to be attributed to my name THANK YOU!-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/New-blegd-smeeg-banner-60.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: System of a Down.
content:
More of the awesome sauce and less of the sucking in my opinion.

They rock hard, but they're a little silly too. I like that they're expressing their social justice stuff without getting bogged down in how serious it is. Love the vocals too; they're not quite like everything else. I tend to like bands with interesting vocals (Coheed and Cambria, Rush, Horrorpops, to name a few). Nice harmony.

I especially like Lonely Day, from Hypnotize. Good song. Plus they get cool points for using the phrase "the most loneliest day of my life" over and over again.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/toughyorp.png[/img]

title: Re: System of a Down.
content:
System of a down is a typical band that went downhill fast after it's debut. I bet that on their next release is not a single song that I can stand.-----------------

Bad band...
IMO Toxicity was there best album, all downhill from there, plus whats up with Malakians singing on the new records?

content:
